#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int i,j,t,n,k,js,kc;
	char s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		j = k = js = kc = 0;
		while(n--)
		{
			cin>>s;
			switch(s)
			{
				case 'S' :
						j++ ;
						if(j == 4)
						{
							j = k = 0;
							js++;
						}
					break;
				case 'C' :
						k++;
						if(k == 4)
						{
							j = k = 0;
							kc++;
						}
					break;
			}
		}
		if(!j && !k)
			cout<<js<<"-"<<kc<<endl;
		else
		{
			int val[4] = {0,15,30,40};
			cout<<js<<"-"<<kc<<","<<val[j]<<"-"<<val[k];
			cout<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
